verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni, In the eighth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh; of Darius הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זְכַרְיָה֙ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔ה <S%H1296><s%> be-rech-Yah, of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עִדּ֥וֹ <S%H5714><s%> id-Do of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

קָצַ֧ף <S%H7107><s%> ka-Tzaf displeased יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem with your fathers קָֽצֶף׃ <S%H7110><s%> Ka-tzef. hath been sore

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta Therefore say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu Turn אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um ye unto me saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts וְאָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ve-'a-Shuv and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, to you אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto you saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu not be like כַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֡ם <S%H1><s%> cha-'a-vo-tei-Chem Be ye not as your fathers אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom קָרְאֽוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'u- have cried אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about הַנְּבִיאִ֨ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nim unto whom the former לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu Turn נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> mid-dar-chei-Chem ways הָרָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Im, ye now from your evil; וּמַעֲלִילֵיכֶם u-ma-'a-li-lei-chem כוּמַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> u-ma-'al-lei-Chem doing קהָֽרָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Im; and [from] your evil וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not שָׁמְע֛וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U but they did not hear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or הִקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> hik-Shi-vu nor hearken אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem Your fathers אַיֵּה־ <S%H346><s%> 'ai-yeh- where הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; are they וְהַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> ve-Han-ne-vi-'Im, where [are] they;and the prophets הַלְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> hal-'o-Lam alway יִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> Yich-Yu. do they live

אַ֣ךְ׀ <S%H389><s%> 'ach but דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai But my words וְחֻקַּ֗י <S%H2706><s%> ve-chuk-Kai, and my statutes אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not הִשִּׂ֖יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> his-Si-gu did they not take hold אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Chem; fathers וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu break וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, and said כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which זָמַ֜ם <S%H2161><s%> za-Mam thought יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Like as the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do לָ֔נוּ <S%H99999><s%> La-nu, כִּדְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1870><s%> kid-ra-Chei-nu unto us according to our ways וּכְמַ֣עֲלָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H4611><s%> u-che-Ma-'a-la-Lei-nu, and according to our doings כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah so hath he dealt אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu. for ס sa-Mek

בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> be-yOm day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah Upon the four לְעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> le-'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> cho-desh month הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- which חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh which [is] the month שְׁבָ֔ט <S%H7627><s%> she-Vat, Sebat בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh; of Darius הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זְכַרְיָה֙ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔הוּ <S%H1296><s%> be-rech-Ya-hu, of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עִדּ֥וֹא <S%H5714><s%> id-Do of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

רָאִ֣יתִי׀ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I saw הַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, by night וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish and behold a man רֹכֵב֙ <S%H7392><s%> ro-Chev riding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> sus horse אָדֹ֔ם <S%H122><s%> 'a-Dom, upon a red וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and he עֹמֵ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med, and he stood בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <S%H1918><s%> ha-ha-das-Sim among the myrtle trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּמְּצֻלָ֑ה <S%H4699><s%> bam-me-tzu-Lah; that [were] in the bottom וְאַחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav and behind סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <S%H122><s%> 'a-dum-Mim, him [were there] red שְׂרֻקִּ֖ים <S%H8320><s%> se-ruk-Kim speckled וּלְבָנִֽים׃ <S%H3836><s%> u-le-va-Nim. and white

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar Then said מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni; I O my lord וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer with me said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'oCh what [are] these;And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֔י Bi, אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אַרְאֶ֖ךָּ <S%H7200><s%> 'ar-'E-ka unto me I will shew מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. these

וַיַּ֗עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an, answered הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And the man הָעֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-Med that stood בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <S%H1918><s%> ha-ha-das-Sim among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach hath sent יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, These [are they] whom the LORD לְהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> le-hit-hal-Lech to walk בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. to and fro through the earth

וַֽיַּעֲנ֞וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nu And they answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach the angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God הָֽעֹמֵד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-Med that stood בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הַהֲדַסִּ֔ים <S%H1918><s%> ha-ha-das-Sim, among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-Lach-nu We have walked to and fro בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz; through the earth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and behold all the earth יֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> yo-She-vet sitteth still וְשֹׁקָֽטֶת׃ <S%H8252><s%> ve-sho-Ka-tet. and is at rest

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'ach- Then the angel יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar and said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֗י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai, how אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תְרַחֵ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> te-ra-Chem how long wilt thou not have mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, on Jerusalem וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei and on the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which זָעַ֔מְתָּה <S%H2194><s%> za-'Am-tah, against which thou hast had indignation זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh these שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im these threescore and ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. whole age

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֖י bi דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim words טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim; with me [with] good דְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim words נִחֻמִֽים׃ <S%H5150><s%> ni-chu-Mim. [and] comfortable
